Page.name: Blackpowder
Page.text: Note: this item can be stored only in the Hazardous Items

Page.name: Snare
Page.text: Traps a player for 2 seconds, self priming.

Page.name: Caltrops
Page.text: Self priming; does 15 base damage plus 1 additional
damage every 5 engineering levels (of the person
3 Iron Bars, 2 Fire Essences, 4 Death Essences.
Note: this item can be stored only in the Hazardous Items

Page.name: P_Caltrops
Page.text: Self priming; poison; does 15 base damage plus 1
3 Iron Bars, 2 Fire Essences, 3 Death Essences,
Note: this item can be stored only in the Hazardous Items

Page.name: Lightmeter
Page.text: Shows how visible you are at night in a particular
location; chance of breaking 1/500 for each use.

Page.name: S_Landmine
Page.text: Self priming; does 45 base damage plus 1 additional
damage every 5 engineering levels (of the person
2 Blackpowders, 6 Nails, 2 Iron Bars, 5 Death Essences,

Page.name: M_Landmine
Page.text: Self priming; does 75 base damage plus 1 additional
damage every 5 engineering levels (of the person
3 Blackpowders, 10 Nails, 3 Iron Bars, 5 Death Essences,

Page.name: L_Landmine
Page.text: Self priming; does 125 base damage plus 1 additional
damage every 5 engineering levels (of the person
5 Blackpowders, 10 Nails, 4 Iron Bars, 5 Death Essences,

Page.name: RC_Landmine
Page.text: Not self priming; does 75 base damage plus 1
3 Blackpowders, 4 Nails, 2 Iron Bars, 5 Death Essences,

Page.name: RC_Detonator
Page.text: Note: the process produces 10 detonators at a time.

Page.name: EN_Cloak_CAM
Page.text: This cloak provides some camouflage, especially
at night or in dark dungeons and caves.
It gives -20 points to your Light Modifier.

Page.name: Night_Visor
Page.text: Magically converts the IR photons into visible
light, allowing the wearer to see better at night.
1 Bronze Bar, 2 Seridium Bars, 3 Enriched Magic Essences,

Page.name: ArrowBolt_Head
Page.text: Note: the molding process produces 2 heads at a time.
1 Iron Bar, 1 Fire Essence, 1 Water Essence.
Tools required to have: Arrow/Bolt Head Mold

Page.name: Invasionmeter
Page.text: Shows how many invaded monsters are in the map, and
chance of breaking 1/10 for each use.
Note: the process produces 10 Invasionmeters at a time.
1 Enriched Magic Essence, 1 Refined Vegetal Mixture,

Page.name: Mana_Drain_Ward
Page.text: For every step while in range of the ward, removes
3 mana plus 1 additional mana every 8 engineering
levels of the person placing it.
35 Energy Essences, 35 Air Essences, 35 Death Essences,

Page.name: Mana_Burn_Ward
Page.text: For every step while in range of the ward, burns
3 mana plus 1 additional mana every 10 engineering
levels of the person placing it.
40 Energy Essences, 40 Air Essences, 40 Death Essences,

Page.name: Inv_Remove_Ward
Page.text: For every step while in range of the ward,
20% chance to lose invisibility plus an additional
1% chance per every 4 engineering levels of the
45 Energy Essences, 45 Magic Essences, 45 Death Essences,

Page.name: MI_Remove_Ward
Page.text: For every step while in range of the ward,
10% chance to lose magic immunity plus an
levels of the person placing it.
30 Energy Essences, 90 Magic Essences, 10 Death Essences,
Knowledge needed: Magic Immunity Removal Ward

Page.name: Point_Defense
Page.text: Protects against the arrows and bolts, reducing
the damage by a random chance between 0 and 100%.

Page.name: Ind_AD
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Attack/Defense.

Page.name: Ind_Crit
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Criticals.

Page.name: Ind_AccMag
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Accuracy/Magic.

Page.name: Ind_HarvDegr
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Harvest/Degrade.

Page.name: Ind_RareFail
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Make Rare/Fail.
Knowledge needed: Make Rare/Fail Indicator Building

Page.name: Treasure_Finder
Page.text: Helps finding treasures that are placed at random
1 Amber, 10 Earth Essences, 10 Honey Comb, 10 Yew
Note: The recipe produces 10 Treasure Finders.

Page.name: Pear_Finder
Page.text: 1 Black Dragon Scale, 1 Ice Dragon Scale,
Note: The recipe produces 60 Pear Finders.

Page.name: Pred_Att
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Attack in
3 Bone Powder, 2 Falcon Feather, 2 Gypsum, 3 Turquoises.

Page.name: Pred_Def
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Attack in
3 Bone Powder, 2 Hawk Feather, 3 Gypsum, 2 Turquoises.

Page.name: Pred_Hit
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Critical
1 Black Panther Fur, 2 Gypsum, 1 Nail, 2 Turquoises.

Page.name: Pred_Dmg
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Critical

Page.name: Pred_Acc
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Accuracy

Page.name: Pred_Mag
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Magic

Page.name: Pred_Har
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on harvesting

Page.name: Pred_Deg
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Degrade

Page.name: Pred_Rar
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Make Rare

Page.name: Pred_Fai
Page.text: Shows the effect of astrology on Failure
